silex_client.action.action_query module¶

class silex_client.action.action_query.ActionQuery(action_name: str, ws_connection: silex_client.network.websocket.WebsocketConnection, config: silex_client.utils.config.Config, environment: dict = <factory>)¶

Bases: object

Initialize and execute a given action

action_name: str¶

The name of the action, it must be the same as the config file name

property commands: dict¶

Shortcut to get the commands of the buffer

config: silex_client.utils.config.Config¶

Config object that will resove the config

environment: dict¶

Dict of variable that store the metadata of the context

execute() → silex_client.action.action_buffer.ActionBuffer¶

Execute the action’s commands in order, send and receive the buffer to the UI when nessesary

property variables: dict¶

Shortcut to get the variable of the buffer

ws_connection: silex_client.network.websocket.WebsocketConnection¶
